statements.update: update SM_Site_Info set C_SITEID =#siteId#, C_SITENAME=#siteName#, C_SITETYPE=#siteType.IntValue#, C_SITELOCATION=#siteLocation#, C_SITEIP1=#siteIp1#, C_SITEIP2=#siteIp2#, I_SITELEVEL=#siteLevel#, I_ISAUTOWEIGH =#IsAutoWeigh.EntityValue#, C_UPDATEUSER=#updateUser#, C_UPDATETIME=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') where I_INTID = #IntId#
statements.select: select I_INTID, C_SITEID, C_SITENAME, C_SITEIP1, I_ISAUTOWEIGH from SM_Site_Info where C_SITEIP1 =#value#

select a.I_INTID, a.C_SITEID, a.C_SITENAME, a.C_SITETYPE, a.C_SITELOCATION, a.C_SITEIP1, a.C_SITEIP2, a.I_SITELEVEL, a.I_ISAUTOWEIGH, a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_Site_Info a order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_INTID, a.C_SITEID, a.C_SITENAME, a.C_SITETYPE, a.C_SITELOCATION, a.C_SITEIP1, a.C_SITEIP2, a.I_SITELEVEL, a.I_ISAUTOWEIGH, a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_Site_Info a where a.C_SITEID=#value# order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_INTID, a.C_SITEID, a.C_SITENAME, a.C_SITETYPE, a.C_SITELOCATION,ne a.C_SITEIP1, a.C_SITEIP2, a.I_SITELEVEL, a.I_ISAUTOWEIGH, a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_Site_Info a where a.C_SITEIP1=#value# order by a.C_CREATETIME desc
